title: Mưa sao băng (Mưa sao băng - Liu Xing Yu - 流星 雨)
lyrics: Wen Rou de Xing Kông Ying gai ràng nǐ gǎn lines Wǒ Zai nǐ Shen Pang Wei nǐ compensation Zhi Yi Pian tiān Kông Bù zhǔn nǐ Nan Guo tì nǐ bǎi Ping jì mò Meng xiǎng de Zhong Liang quán compensation Dou Jiao gei wǒ Qian nǐ shǒu Gen Zhe wǒ zǒu Feng Zai dà bạn ZEN Yang nǐ yǒu le wǒ Zai Ye bú Hui Mi Lu Fang Xiang Pei nǐ Qu Kạn liú xīng yǔ luò zài zhè dì qiú shàng Ràng buộc luò zài wǒ jiān bǎng Yao nǐ Xiang Xin wǒ de ài zhǐ Ken Wei nǐ Yong gǎn nǐ Hui Kan Jian xìng fú de suǒ zài Shāng gǎn ruò tài du xīn ū ě ě ǎ Pí Juan de yan huǒ wǒ Du Hui tì nǐ assign zǒu Càn làn de yan yǔ zhǐ Neng diǎn zhuì Qing gǎn ru guǒ wǒ chén mò Yin Wei wǒ Zhen de ài nǐ Qian nǐ shǒu Gen Zhe wǒ zǒu Fēng zài dà bạn ZEN Yang nǐ yǒu le wǒ Zai Ye bú Hui Mi Lu Fang Xiang Yǔ hé Yun Jian Jian sàn Kai sǎ Xia Yi Wen Pian nuǎn Wǒ Yao Fen xiǎng nǐ yǎn Zhong dì Lei Guang
